It's raining outside. The forecast said that the rainy season starts today.
I like the rain. Whether it's a gentle drizzle or a heavy downpour, it feels as if it's expressing someone's emotions through its rhythm.
I made a cute hair ties today. IT feels like my whole outfit is finally completed.
Should I try to wear them tomorrow?
June 22nd Rika is bullying me. She purposely threw her ball and it hit me.
She said she was annoyed because of my hair hair tie.
My hair tie is gone. I found it later in the trash can.
Today, I sketched new hair tie design. I added some patterns that I think will go well with my fit.
I think it was very cute!
I need to pick up materials from my favorite craft store tomorrow. There's nothing more fulfilling than the moment when what I've envisioned becomes reality—I'm so happy.
My mother threw away my sketch. She tore it up, and told me to stop drawing such stupid things and just study. It doesn't suit someone as ugly as me she said. She is so, so, so mean!
I hate mommy! Why did you make me so ugly?
You never praised me, You don't even take care of me, and you always ignore me.
Bad things keep happening. I'm starting to hate everything.
My dairy has become empty, I'm so depressed.
In desperation, I asked the boy I was into in what he thought of me.
I don't care anymore, it doesn't matter anymore anyway.
He laughed and told everyone what I said to him.
If I knew this would happen, I shouldn't have said anything, why am I always like this?
I tried asking the teacher for advice again, but all they said was to 'just do my best,' which only made things worse.
They’re always smiling when Rika and the others are around, but whenever I talk to them, they look at me like I’m some kind of problem.
Now that I think about it, even when I forgot something, I feel like they were only harsh with me.
It made me feel like I’m just a nuisance to the teacher.
Daddy’s been working all the time lately. He couldn’t take me to the aquarium today either.
If you’re just going to break your promise, you shouldn’t have gotten my hopes up.
There is nothing that interest me anymore.
It's so painful. Please someone help me.
Please someone notice me, praise me, tell me that I've done my best, please...
I don't care about anything anymore, I decided to ran away.
It's just makes me think of bad things.
The heavy rain felt like it mirrored my emotions.
After two stops, I got off the train and found myself in front of a mysterious shop.
My curiosity got the better of me, so I went inside, and a kind man approached me.
The kind man handed me a towel to dry off.
When I looked up to thank him, I couldn’t hold back my tears.
He was just so kind, patiently listening to everything I had to say.
He saw my sketch and complimented me.
So beautiful, so cute, It suit me he said. He said that to an ugly person like me? there is no way it would suit me.
It was the first time anyone ever complimented me. I really feel like I get along well with him.
I wanted to grow closer to him and cherish our time together even more.
But the moment I realized I loved him, that dream quickly fell apart.
There was this woman, dressed in clothes far more elegant than anything I could design.
She was prettier and more stylish than I could ever be.
Her sweeter voice called out to him, and they touched, their connection undeniable.
At the end, the two of them disappeared into the night filled with the sound of rain.
I see... Yeah, of course. I knew that all along.
But still, it’s just too much. It’s not fair.
I have nothing to be scared of.
Thank you for finding me, thank you for acknowledging me.
\ac Are you not interested in other men?
\ac Are you not interested in other men?
\SE[0] There's only one thing that worried me.
It felt like it crushes me.
It's like I'm all alone in this world.
There are definitely times like that.
I've been busy with work lately...
I kind of forget on how it feels.
\SE[2] But will you feel lonely again
once you are no longer busy?
I’d be really terrified of being alone.
time alone with your own loneliness.
Loneliness, huh? When I was busy,
I sort of forgot about it
— or maybe I was just running away
from the reality of being lonely.
\SE[0] For me, I can’t even run away.
I just can’t escape the loneliness.
